Examples

Example 1: Event calendar

Create a browsable calendar listing your events. 

<div id="example1" swa="Events FROM ../data/events/exampleevents.json TEMPLATE calendar"></div>

Example 2: Simple event list

Simply list all events in a list. Unlike presenting the data with the Present component here events are sortet by time and time display is automaticaly transfered to local time options of the user. 

<div id="example2" swa="Events FROM ../data/events/exampleevents.json TEMPLATE list"></div>

Example 3: Showing a timeline

Create a nice timeline showing the events of the past or upcoming ones. 

<div id="example3" swa="Events FROM ../data/events/exampleevents.json TEMPLATE timeline"></div>
